com.mobilerq.android.sdk

Class MrqContentListLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Loader<D>
      • android.content.AsyncTaskLoader<List<MrqContent>>
        • com.mobilerq.android.sdk.MrqContentListLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MrqSdk.OnContentUpdateListener

    public class MrqContentListLoader
extends android.content.AsyncTaskLoader<List<MrqContent>>
implements MrqSdk.OnContentUpdateListener
    Load content updates asynchronously from MrqSdk. This is commonly used to update MrqContentListAdapter asynchronously. This class is a MrqSdk.OnContentUpdateListener and is registered with MrqSdk by onStartLoading() and unregistered by onReset().

    The following it is a simple implementation of LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks that creates MrqContentListLoader and updates MrqContentListAdapter.

    Example LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks
    class LoaderCallbacks extends LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<List<MrqContent>> {

     MrqContentListLoader adaptor;
     Context context;

     public LoaderCallbacks(Context context, MrqContentListLoader adaptor) {
        this.adaptor = adaptor;
        this.context = context;
     }

     public MrqContentListLoader onCreateLoader(int id, Bundle args) {
        return new MrqContentListLoader(context);
     }

     public void onLoadFinished(Loader<List<MrqContent>> loader, List<MrqContent> update) {
         adaptor.updateContentList(update);
     }

     public void onLoaderReset(Loader<List<MrqContent>> loader) {
         adaptor.updateContentList(null);
     }
 }
    See Also:
    LoaderManager, LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks, MrqContentListAdapter, MrqContentListFragment
